19#include "TritMatrix.h"
20
21namespace ZXing {
22
23class BitArray;
24
25namespace QRCode {
26
27enum class ErrorCorrectionLevel;
28class Version;
29
30class MatrixUtil
31{
32public:
33 static const int NUM_MASK_PATTERNS = 8;
34
35 static void BuildMatrix(const BitArray& dataBits, ErrorCorrectionLevel ecLevel, const Version& version, int maskPattern, TritMatrix& matrix);
36};

38} // QRCode
